entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
